T02D2661:320a-19: gtor ma'i rgyu cha sna tshogs dang //
T02D2661:320a-20: 'byung bo'i kha zas bsog par bya //
T02D2661:320a-21: gzhan yang zhi ba'i mchod rdzas ni //
T02D2661:320a-23: nas dang gro dang ga pur rnams //
T02D2661:320a-24: bul gang yin no nas thug dang //
T02D2661:320a-25: 'bras chan ma du bre gang shis //
T02D2661:320a-26: gzhan yang rgyas dbang drag po yi //
T02D2661:320a-27: thug pa thams cad bre re'o //
T02D2661:320a-28: gzhan ma kun la phul re'o //
T02D2661:320a-29: lha bshos khur ba dog gu rnams //
T02D2661:320a-30: lha grangs bzhin du bsog par bya //
T02D2661:320a-31: padma lhor bting ku sha nub //
T02D2661:320a-32: khri ni shar te gru gsum byang //
T02D2661:320a-33: las bzhi'i gdan ni dgod par bya //
T02D2661:320a-34: rnam par rgyal lam khro phyogs hom //
T02D2661:320a-35: spyan sogs yum bzhis lhag chad 'bum //
T02D2661:320a-38: dbang po dbang ni nyi ma 'dra //
T02D2661:320a-39: dbang po drag po dud pa 'dra //
T02D2661:320a-40: dbyig pa bgrang phreng spyi blugs gzung //
T02D2661:320a-41: dang po ting 'dzin gyis bskul nas //
T02D2661:320a-42: bum pa zla ba padma dang //
T02D2661:320a-43: btud pa'i mdangs ldan bsil byed yum //
T02D2661:320a-44: bdud rtsi'o ma bu ram zho //
T02D2661:320a-45: bkang ba'i bum pa so so la //
T02D2661:320a-46: rin chen 'phan byang gdugs ldan te //
T02D2661:320a-47: rnam snang mdzad dang gsum dag gis //
T02D2661:320a-48: zhabs kyi drung du gzung ba dang //
T02D2661:320a-49: khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D2661:320a-50: las dang sdug bsngal zhi bar byed //
T02D2661:320a-51: aom ga na ga ga ne lo tsa ne /
T02D2661:320a-52: tsa le tsa le tsu na te /
T02D2661:320a-53: ga tang gu tang sh'intam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D2661:320a-54: dpal rtse rnon po rtse gsum pos //
T02D2661:320a-55: dug gsum 'joms pa'i las rnams mdzod //
T02D2661:320a-56: lus ngag yid gsum sbyang ba dang //
T02D2661:320b-0: btab pas gshegs @320b chags brlab bar byed //
T02D2661:320b-1: hom zlum lham pa zla gam ae //
T02D2661:320b-2: rdo rje padma mda' gzhu dang //
T02D2661:320b-3: rtsang thod rgyan gyis mdzes rgyan gdengs //
T02D2661:320b-4: zhi rgyas dbang drag lha rnams mchod //
T02D2661:320b-5: yam bam ae yi dkyil 'khor drang //
T02D2661:320b-7: du yod pa la zung re'o //
T02D2661:320b-8: yam shing dkar ser dmar nag la //
T02D2661:320b-9: khung ni khyad par rang sor gcal //
T02D2661:320b-10: brgyad dang bcu drug nyi shu'i gzhi //
T02D2661:320b-11: bud shing khru gang do gsum mtshungs //
T02D2661:320b-12: sbom phra sngags mkhan mdzum [*mdzub] mo tsam //
T02D2661:320b-13: zhi ba yi ni lha grangs bzhin //
T02D2661:320b-14: yam shing mdzub gang bcag khru gang //
T02D2661:320b-15: brkyang khru gang du shes par bya ;
T02D2661:320b-16: / bud shing khru gang do bzhi ni //
T02D2661:320b-17: rgyas pa yi ni lha grangs bzhin //
T02D2661:320b-18: dbang gi yam bud zhi ba'i tshad //
T02D2661:320b-19: drag po'i yam bud rgyas pa'i tshad //
T02D2661:320b-20: zhi ba'i dris bsku rgyas sprang rtsi //
T02D2661:320b-21: dbang btsag tsandan bsres pas bsku //
T02D2661:320b-22: drag po khrag spos bsres pa bsku //
T02D2661:320b-23: zho can ser skyur rtsub shing la //
T02D2661:320b-24: sor bzhi yar rtse ral gri bzhin //
T02D2661:320b-25: rting zlum zur bzhi zor 'dra dang //
T02D2661:320b-26: zur gsum rdzu thur tshad du bya //
T02D2661:320b-27: lo ma sor bzhi so so'i shing //
T02D2661:320b-28: sor gnyis rtsa ba bshus lha grangs //
T02D2661:320b-29: thab kyi bye brag che chung las //
T02D2661:320b-30: zho can ser skyur rtsub shing la //
T02D2661:320b-31: yu ba sboms su mthe bong tsam //
T02D2661:320b-32: srid du khru do gang phyed gang //
T02D2661:320b-33: sor bzhi bskyur khar nas sor gcig /
T02D2661:320b-34: zabs sor gnyis la so so'i dbyibs //
T02D2661:320b-35: de dbus gtso mo'i phyag mtshan bri //
T02D2661:320b-36: ba ran phyogs bzhir phyag rgya gzhag /
T02D2661:320b-37: bar bar rdo rje pad ma gzhu //
T02D2661:320b-38: thod pas mtshan pa dgang gzar bya //
T02D2661:320b-39: srid khru gang la dkyus sor gnyis //
T02D2661:320b-40: zabs su sor gcig de'i dbus su //
T02D2661:320b-41: gtso bo'i phyag rgyas mtshan blugs gzar //
T02D2661:320b-42: blugs gzar steng phub mdun du gzhag / zho can ser skyur rtsub shing la //
T02D2661:320b-43: mdud pa dag la gtso yum dgod //
T02D2661:320b-45: rked mdud sgo ba khru khyud gang //
T02D2661:320b-46: rtse mo ya ma bam ae phat //
T02D2661:320b-47: gtso bo'i phyag mtshan spyir bris te //
T02D2661:320b-49: khru gang tshad bya srid du'o //
T02D2661:320b-50: spom phra mtho gang sor bzhi bya //
T02D2661:320b-51: dkyus sor bco brgyad zabs su ni //
T02D2661:320b-52: sor ni brgyad pa de dbus su //
T02D2661:320b-53: ri rab rgya mtsho bri bar bya //
T02D2661:320b-54: ngos la ri bdun mtsho yang dgod //
T02D2661:320b-55: so so'i gtun gyi kha ran la //
T02D2661:321a-2: ji bzhin dkyil 'khor dag la'ang brgyan //
T02D2661:321a-3: las bzhi sngags pa'i chas gos ni //
T02D2661:321a-4: thugs kyi ze'u ldir stod g-yogs dang //
T02D2661:321a-5: brjid pa'i chos gos smad dkris dang //
T02D2661:321a-6: gar gyi gtsang gos so so'i mdog / g-yab mos spyan 'dren phyag mtshan ni//
T02D2661:321a-7: so so'i kha dog dar dag la //
T02D2661:321a-8: ba dan bzhi yang dar 'drar bya //
T02D2661:321a-9: dkar po ser po dmar nag la //
T02D2661:321a-11: dri zhim ser skyur rtsub shing gi //
T02D2661:321a-12: sa phyogs de dag nye ba ru //
T02D2661:321a-13: shing gi lha ste mdog dkar la //
T02D2661:321a-14: rin chen sna tshogs dri zhim bcas //
T02D2661:321a-15: phul la snying rje byams bsgoms la ;
T02D2661:321a-16: / rten 'brel brjod de rin phul la //
T02D2661:321a-17: me yi phyogs nas gcad par bya //
T02D2661:321a-18: srid du ho ma gyur mnyam la //
T02D2661:321a-19: sbom phra khru gang yod pa'i shing //
T02D2661:321a-20: bzhi gnyis sum gnyis mchog tu gces //
T02D2661:321a-21: gzhan yang ro bsregs shing dag la //
T02D2661:321a-22: sbom phra khru do yod pa yi //
T02D2661:321a-23: shar nub gnyis su re re yang ;
T02D2661:321a-24: / srid du mchod snam yang na ni //
T02D2661:321a-25: dngos grub gsol bsgor gzhab shing gnyis //
T02D2661:321a-26: shing rgyu phra sbom do dang gsum //
T02D2661:321a-27: theg pa'i khyad par bstan pa ni //
T02D2661:321a-28: kri yog ma h'a yo ga gsum //
T02D2661:321a-29: gang gi sgor zhugs de lhas sbyang //
T02D2661:321a-30: goms pa'i dbang du shes pa mchog / rim pa gsum du shes par bya //
T02D2661:321a-31: de steng khang pa lus mgo tshad //
T02D2661:321a-32: phrag non bzhi yang bzhir dmigs la //
T02D2661:321a-33: 'tshogs nas shing gi bdag po la //
T02D2661:321a-34: mchod pa gtor ma sna tshogs ni //
T02D2661:321a-35: stegs bu khru gang padma bre //
T02D2661:321a-36: de dbus shing la 'bag bris gzhag / las kyi skal ldan gang dag gis //
T02D2661:321a-38: yo byad thams cad tshang ba mchog / che chung mang nyung rgyu las tshad //
T02D2661:321a-39: ci yod yid 'ong mdzes pa dgram //
T02D2661:321a-40: de dag byin gyis brlab pa ni //
T02D2661:321a-41: khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal dang //
T02D2661:321a-42: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byin gyis brlab //
T02D2661:321a-43: aom badzra kro dha tree lo kya bi dza ya /
T02D2661:321a-46: bla re gtsug tor rnam rgyal brlab //
T02D2661:321a-49: ba dan 'phan tsho des byin brlab //
T02D2661:321a-52: gdugs ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar brlab //
T02D2661:321a-54: rgyal mtshan ke tu des byin brlab //
T02D2661:321a-55: aom ratna ke tu aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-0: lnga ldi so @321b so las rigs brlab //
T02D2661:321b-1: aom sarba karma tree lo kya bi dza ya aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-2: tshon sna bde gshegs lnga yis brlab //
T02D2661:321b-3: de yang dkyil 'khor gang yin nyid //
T02D2661:321b-4: ser po aom aom aom a'a h'um /
T02D2661:321b-5: bskyur te smon lam gdab par bya //
T02D2661:321b-6: dkar po aom h'um aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-7: nag po aom sva aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-8: dmar po aom aom aam a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-9: ljang gu aom ha aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-10: srad bu gang yin gtso bos brlab //
T02D2661:321b-12: rta babs phyag rgya bzhis byin brlab //
T02D2661:321b-14: mda' bzhi rdo rje chags pas brlab //
T02D2661:321b-16: ral gri rdo rje rnon pos brlab //
T02D2661:321b-18: phur bu khro bo lngas byin brlab //
T02D2661:321b-20: ya manta ka hya gr'i ba aa mri ta kunda li /
T02D2661:321b-21: ma h'a bha la aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-22: bum pa gang yin yum gyis brlab //
T02D2661:321b-23: aom dh'a tu shva ri aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-25: h'um h'um h'um aa pra ti ha ta aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-26: do shal gtsug tor rgyal bas brlab /
T02D2661:321b-28: dril bu ku lan dha ras brlab //
T02D2661:321b-29: aom ku landha ri pradznyo ba ba ba sho yo ga shu dznya aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-30: rnga yab rgyal po bzhis byin brlab //
T02D2661:321b-31: aom drishta rashta bi ru dha ka /
T02D2661:321b-35: nor bu kun gyi yon tan brlab //
T02D2661:321b-36: aom sarba ratna ku la aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-37: me long rdo rje sems dpas brlab /
T02D2661:321b-38: aom badzra satva a'a darsha aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-39: spyan snying sangs rgyas spyan gyis brlab /
T02D2661:321b-40: aom buddha sarba ku la tsitta dzny'a na aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-41: nyi zla thabs dang shes rab brlab //
T02D2661:321b-42: aom surya tsandra du na pra dzny'a aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-43: btung ba m'a ma k'is byin brlab //
T02D2661:321b-45: bdug pa me tog dri chab me //
T02D2661:321b-46: aom badzra dhu pe pushpe a'a lo ke gandhe aom a'a: h'um /
T02D2661:321b-47: lha bshos khur ba bca' ba'i tshogs //
T02D2661:321b-48: ku lan dha ras byin gyis brlab //
T02D2661:321b-49: aom badzra ku landha ri aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-50: phung po lnga nyid rnam grol lngar //
T02D2661:321b-51: bsgyur zhing aom skan dha shu da nya aom a'a: h'um /
T02D2661:321b-52: 'o ma la sogs mngar gsum ni //
T02D2661:321b-53: m'a ma k'is ni byin gyis brlab //
T02D2661:321b-54: aom m'a ma k'i aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-55: gtor ma thug pa grangs ldan brlab //
T02D2661:321b-57: 'bru rnams m'a ma k'is byin brlab //
T02D2661:321b-58: aom m'a ma k'i aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:321b-59: 'bras yos ma du gos dkar mo //
T02D2661:321b-61: ga pur sman rnams las thams cad //
T02D2661:322a-0: @322a * // aom badzra aa mri ta kunda li aom a'a:h'um /
T02D2661:322a-1: gtsang 'bob sangs rgyas spyan gyis brlab //
T02D2661:322a-2: aom lam ke shva ra ti dh'a tu aom a'a: h'um /
T02D2661:322a-3: yam shing bud shing thams cad ni //
T02D2661:322a-4: me lhas byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D2661:322a-6: shag te'u shug te'u cang te'u sogs //
T02D2661:322a-7: sangs rgyas spyan gyis byin gyis brlab //
T02D2661:322a-8: aom m'um badzra aom a'a: h'um /
T02D2661:322a-9: zangs phye ske tshe til la phug / kro ti shva ri sangs rgyas spyan //
T02D2661:322a-10: aom kro ti shva ri sva ta badzri aom a'a: h'um /
T02D2661:322a-11: tshar te'u la sogs m'a ma k'i //
T02D2661:322a-12: aom m'a ma k'i aom a'a: h'um /
T02D2661:322a-13: dgang gzar gang yin yum gyis brlab //
T02D2661:322a-14: blugs gzar gang yin yab kyis brlab //
T02D2661:322a-15: phur bu gang yin gtso 'khor khro //
T02D2661:322a-16: gtun khung gang yin de yum 'khor //
T02D2661:322a-17: mda' gzhu ma mo tsoo ris brlab //
T02D2661:322a-18: aom badzra tsoo ri aom a'a: h'um /
T02D2661:322a-19: gzhan rnams bdud rtsi 'khyil pas brlab //
T02D2661:322a-20: g-yab dar rlung lhas byin gyis brlab //
T02D2661:322a-21: aom badzra ba ya bya aom a'a: h'um /
T02D2661:322a-22: zhal kham m'a ma k'is byin brlab //
T02D2661:322a-23: sreg shing bhr'um gyis brlab par bya //
T02D2661:322a-24: aom bhr'um ae bam ma y'a sbyar //
T02D2661:322a-26: chas gos 'bru lngas byin brlabs gzhag / ku sha bting ba'i stan steng du //
T02D2661:322a-27: sngags g-yog shar bltas nyal du gzhug / lha rnams kyis ni legs dgu ster //
T02D2661:322a-28: byin gyis brlab pa ma byas na //
T02D2661:322a-30: de bas nan tan bskyed de bya //
T02D2661:322a-31: yang na rnam rgyal lam bdud rtsi //
T02D2661:322a-32: 'khyil pa nyid kyis brlab kyang rung //
T02D2661:322a-33: dkyil 'khor ci yang bzhengs pa la //
T02D2661:322a-34: phrin las bzhi yi ho ma ldan bya //
T02D2661:322a-35: yang ni ting 'dzin bye brag las //
T02D2661:322a-36: las bzhi'i cho ga rdzogs pa mchog / cho ga ma tshang las mi 'grub //
T02D2661:322a-37: de phyir sta gon rdzogs par bya //
T02D2661:322a-38: au dumb'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D2661:322a-39: ston pa po ni shin tu yang //
T02D2661:322a-40: de bas kyang ni 'jig rten du //
T02D2661:322a-41: 'byung ba yang ni shin tu dkon //
T02D2661:322a-42: dam pa'i chos kyang ston pa dka'//
T02D2661:322a-43: dam pa'i chos ni ston srid kyang //
T02D2661:322a-44: gsang sngags ston pa shin tu dka'o //
T02D2661:322a-45: gal te gang sngags ston kyang rung //
T02D2661:322a-47: bskal bar yang ni sngags spyad pa'i //
T02D2661:322a-48: las dbang gis ni deng mthong nas //
T02D2661:322a-49: rgyal po yang ni ma yin yang //
T02D2661:322a-50: rgyal po nyid ni chen por gyur//
T02D2661:322b-0: @322b bde gshegs rnams ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2661:322b-1: yon tan gyi ni mchog kyang 'thob //
T02D2661:322b-2: tshe ring zhing ni longs spyod kyang //
T02D2661:322b-3: phun sum nyid ni tshogs par 'gyur //
T02D2661:322b-4: las rnams kun ni thams cad kyang //
T02D2661:322b-5: btang snyoms pa ni yan lag go //
T02D2661:322b-6: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las dag dang //
T02D2661:322b-7: cho 'phrul bzhi yi che ba dang //
T02D2661:322b-8: gang zhig dkyil 'khor nang gzhug pa //
T02D2661:322b-9: gsum po de ni gzhan don gsungs //
T02D2661:322b-10: dang po las gsungs rim pa ni //
T02D2661:322b-11: tshes grangs chos klog gzhi bdag dang //
T02D2661:322b-12: srad bu tshad ldan bgegs bsal bsrung //
T02D2661:322b-13: thugs dam bskul g-yog dbang bskur sbyang //
T02D2661:322b-14: rang bzhin thig gdab slar bsdu dang //
T02D2661:322b-15: tshon dgye phyag rgya rgyan rnams dgod ;
T02D2661:322b-16: / gsum lnga bdun dang bcu gcig dang //
T02D2661:322b-17: bcu gsum bco lnga yar gyi shis //
T02D2661:322b-18: zhi dang rgyas pa mchog tu bshad //
T02D2661:322b-19: bcu bdun nyi shu gnyis brgyad do //
T02D2661:322b-20: dbang dang drag po'i dkyil 'khor mchog / dus dang mtshan ma kri ya'o //
T02D2661:322b-21: nyi ma dge zhing rgyu skar bzang //
T02D2661:322b-22: mtshan ma'i sems rtog mi dmigs pa //
T02D2661:322b-23: de ni chos dbyings gnas pa yin //
T02D2661:322b-24: de ltar dus dang mthun pa dang //
T02D2661:322b-25: phyogs bzhir dge bsnyen gtsang sbra can //
T02D2661:322b-26: sha dang chang bcad bud med spangs //
T02D2661:322b-27: tshul du shis pa rgyun mi bcad //
T02D2661:322b-28: shar du sdud pa tshigs su bcad //
T02D2661:322b-29: lhor ni bzang po spyod pa'o //
T02D2661:322b-30: nub tu snang brgyad gsang ba'i mdo //
T02D2661:322b-31: byang du gser 'od dam pa gdon //
T02D2661:322b-32: gus par mchod cing bden pa bklag / tshon sna lnga skud bu mos bkal //
T02D2661:322b-33: de nyid kyis ni brgyar bzlas te //
T02D2661:322b-34: rgyu bzang tshad la phebs pa dang //
T02D2661:322b-35: bzang po'i lta stangs sbyar nas ni //
T02D2661:322b-36: mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab po //
T02D2661:322b-37: lag na rdo rjes bgegs bskrad bya //
T02D2661:322b-38: srung ba chen mos bdag gzhan bsrung //
T02D2661:322b-39: phyogs bcu gtso la sogs pa yi //
T02D2661:322b-40: thugs dam bskul nas srad bur thim //
T02D2661:322b-41: de lta'i rigs bzhi'i thugs las phyung //
T02D2661:322b-42: gtso bo gang yin thugs zhugs phyung //
T02D2661:322b-43: de nas gtso bo gang yin gyi //
T02D2661:322b-44: sangs rgyas zhing rnams sbyang ba dang //
T02D2661:322b-45: myur du sems can don bsgrub dang //
T02D2661:322b-46: las kyi dngos po gang byed pa'i //
T02D2661:322b-47: las rnams ma lus khyod kyis byos //
T02D2661:322b-48: las kyi rdo rje don yod grub //
T02D2661:322b-49: kha dog sna tshogs byung ba la //
T02D2661:322b-51: karma zhes ni dbang bskur ro //
T02D2661:323a-2: sngags g-yog byang shar mtshams su ni //
T02D2661:323a-3: pus btsugs thal sbyar 'dug pa yis //
T02D2661:323a-4: dkyil 'khor gang bzhengs las rnams ni //
T02D2661:323a-5: gang bzheng gtso bo'i bka' bzhin du //
T02D2661:323a-6: las kyi byed por bdag gyur pas //
T02D2661:323a-7: thams cad ma lus bdag gis bgyi //
T02D2661:323a-8: de nas thub dbang bskul byas nas //
T02D2661:323a-9: de nas sbyang bar bya ba ni //
T02D2661:323a-10: bdag po gang yin ting 'dzin las //
T02D2661:323a-11: yi gyis phrag dog gtor lud dkyil //
T02D2661:323a-12: de na rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar //
T02D2661:323a-14: bdag nyid yi ge khar gyur gtso //
T02D2661:323a-15: mnga' bdag de yi byin brlabs chu //
T02D2661:323a-16: rgyun gyi khams dag de nyid rang //
T02D2661:323a-17: de yi byin brlabs yon tan bcu //
T02D2661:323a-18: de mthu las byed las rnams 'grub //
T02D2661:323a-19: mkhas pas thig btab tsa th'i'i dmigs //
T02D2661:323a-20: lha mos gshegs bskul skud la thim //
T02D2661:323a-21: h'um las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur //
T02D2661:323a-22: lte ba'i thad kar thal bkan la //
T02D2661:323a-23: g-yas pa bkan gzhag mtheb ngos sbyar //
T02D2661:323a-24: de nas sbub ldog nam mkhar gdab //
T02D2661:323a-25: lan gcig gnyis gsum btab pa'i mthus //
T02D2661:323a-26: rang bzhin byon dang ting 'dzin gsal //
T02D2661:323a-27: ngan song gsum bde zhus bshad bstod //
T02D2661:323a-28: mchog gsum lha tshogs mchod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2661:323a-29: aom bhr'um sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa aatma ko& ham /
T02D2661:323a-30: zhes pas rang bzhin thig gdab bya //
T02D2661:323a-31: bdag nyid shar lho mtshams song ste //
T02D2661:323a-32: las bdag byang shar mtshams 'dug ste //
T02D2661:323a-33: de nas dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
T02D2661:323a-34: dam tshig bskul dang las bya'o //
T02D2661:323a-35: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02D2661:323a-36: tshad ldan sngags g-yog med phur chogs //
T02D2661:323a-37: sems can don byas bdag nyid kyi //
T02D2661:323a-38: slar yang thugs kar bsdu bar bya //
T02D2661:323a-39: aom badzra sam ha ra na h'um h'um h'um /
T02D2661:323a-40: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni //
T02D2661:323a-41: yon tan phrin las rigs lnga yi //
T02D2661:323a-42: gtso bo gang yin de nyid la //
T02D2661:323a-43: gsang gsum zhes su bsgrags pa'ang mchog / tshon ni dri dang pa tsan dang //
T02D2661:323a-44: rin chen phung po gsum du bstan //
T02D2661:323a-45: yon tan sku 'dra las thugs bzhin //
T02D2661:323a-46: dbus kyi pho brang bskor ba yin //
T02D2661:323a-48: phye ma dkar pos nyis rim bri //
T02D2661:323a-49: lhas kyi lha las ma gtogs pa //
T02D2661:323a-50: phal pa dang ni bsrung bkra shis //
T02D2661:323a-51: phye ma dkar po tshig kyang bri //
T02D2661:323b-1: / gnyis pa tri la sgo gong brtsig / rkyang bris phyag rgya dgod pa yang //
T02D2661:323b-2: gtso bo gzugs la 'khor phyag rgya //
T02D2661:323b-4: tha mal pa dag thig le'o //
T02D2661:323b-5: tshon la sogs pa'i las rnams kun //
T02D2661:323b-6: dbang ldan phyogs nas bya bar shis //
T02D2661:323b-7: dbang ldan 'dren pa'i lha dbang phyogs //
T02D2661:323b-8: tshon ni nang nas dgye bar bya //
T02D2661:323b-9: de nas phyag rgya nor bu bum //
T02D2661:323b-10: dgod pa nyid du bya ba yin //
T02D2661:323b-11: gzungs thag slob dpon gzung ba shis //
T02D2661:323b-12: de 'og tshon rnams rim gyis gtang //
T02D2661:323b-13: de nas phyag rgya'am yig 'bru gzhag / thog mar sgo yi tshon dgye nas //
T02D2661:323b-14: de 'og sgo yi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2661:323b-15: glang seng rnams kyang dgod par bya //
T02D2661:323b-16: mandala thams cad byi dor ni //
T02D2661:323b-17: dang po ba lci de 'og tu //
T02D2661:323b-18: rnam lngas bskus nas de 'og tu //
T02D2661:323b-19: dri yi chus ni byug par bya //
T02D2661:323b-20: tshon dgye dus su thugs dam bskul //
T02D2661:323b-21: sems can khams ni zhi byed pa'i //
T02D2661:323b-22: 'di ni chos dbyings ro yin pas //
T02D2661:323b-23: sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te //
T02D2661:323b-24: de bas bdag gis bka' bzhin du //
T02D2661:323b-25: tshon 'gyed pa yi las bgyid na //
T02D2661:323b-26: rgyal ba kun byin dbang bskur cig / phyag rgya dgod phyir thugs dam bskul //
T02D2661:323b-27: sku gsung thugs rtags mtshan ma 'di //
T02D2661:323b-28: 'gro la phan phyir dgod do zhes//
T02D2661:323b-29: sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te //
T02D2661:323b-30: rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur cig / rgyan rnams dang po nor bu ste //
T02D2661:323b-31: de la sogs pa dgod par bya //
T02D2661:323b-32: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po ches //
T02D2661:323b-34: sngags rnams gong ma de las ni //
T02D2661:323b-36: rin chen sna tshogs rgyu las byas //
T02D2661:323b-37: kha dog dbyibs su ldan pa yi //
T02D2661:323b-38: shes rab yum gyi bum pa 'dis //
T02D2661:323b-41: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin pas //
T02D2661:323b-42: thugs rje gzungs thag chen po yis //
T02D2661:323b-44: phrin las yon tan lhun grub pa'i //
T02D2661:323b-45: bla re kun bzang dang nyid rtags //
T02D2661:323b-46: 'bras bu rtags kyi phyag rgya yis //
T02D2661:323b-48: dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i //
T02D2661:323b-49: sku yi phyag rgya mtshon mdzad cing //
T02D2661:324a-3: nyon mongs gdung ba sel byed pa'i //
T02D2661:324a-4: gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu bar ldan //
T02D2661:324a-5: skyabs chen byams pa chen po yis //
T02D2661:324a-7: nyon mongs bdud las rgyal mdzad pa'i //
T02D2661:324a-8: rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rgyal mtshan te //
T02D2661:324a-9: rtags kyi rgyal mtshan chen po 'dis //
T02D2661:324a-11: phrin las cho 'phrul bzhi bzhi yis //
T02D2661:324a-12: las rnams rgya mtsho rdzogs mdzad pa'i //
T02D2661:324a-13: snyan pa'i ba dan gsung sgrogs pas //
T02D2661:324a-16: kha dog sna lnga 'bar ba yi //
T02D2661:324a-17: lhab lhub lda ldi chen po yis //
T02D2661:324a-19: thugs rje gzungs thag ye shes bzhis //
T02D2661:324a-20: sangs rgyas bzhi yi phrin las thugs //
T02D2661:324a-21: thugs rje srad bu 'phel gzungs kyis //
T02D2661:324a-23: tshad med bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhis//
T02D2661:324a-24: 'gro ba'i don rnams rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D2661:324a-25: dri zhim rta babs phyag rgya yis //
T02D2661:324a-27: mgo rmongs 'khyams pa'i mun sel mdzad //
T02D2661:324a-28: gti mug go bral shes rab mdas //
T02D2661:324a-29: gting dbugs byang chub lam 'god pas //
T02D2661:324a-32: mtha' gnyis gcod mdzad byams pa'i mgon //
T02D2661:324a-33: shes rab rtags kyi ral gri 'dis //
T02D2661:324a-35: khro gtum rngam pa'i tshul 'chang bas //
T02D2661:324a-36: log par lta ba'i zhe sdang 'dul //
T02D2661:324a-37: ye shes 'bar ba'i k'i la yas //
T02D2661:324a-39: mtshan ma'i yul rnams sel mdzad cing //
T02D2661:324a-40: srung dang mtshams kyi las mdzad pa //
T02D2661:324a-43: dus gsum rgyal ba ma lus pa'i //
T02D2661:324a-44: dpe byad rtags kyi do shal chun //
T02D2661:324a-47: shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa'i rtags //
T02D2661:324a-48: rin chen mchog gsum mtshan brjod pa'i //
T02D2661:324a-49: gsung dbyangs drug cu ldan dril 'dis //
T02D2661:324a-51: mtshan ma'i bag chags kun sel ba'i //
T02D2661:324b-0: dus gsum sangs @324b rgyas thams cad la //
T02D2661:324b-1: rgyal chen bzhis phul mchod mchog gis //
T02D2661:324b-3: chos rnams gzugs brnyan 'dra ba yi //
T02D2661:324b-4: rang bzhin dag pas rtog pa med //
T02D2661:324b-5: ma rmongs ston pa'i me long 'dis //
T02D2661:324b-7: zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas shing //
T02D2661:324b-9: thabs dang shes rab nyi zla 'dis //
T02D2661:324b-11: gzhan yang mchod pa'i rgyan 'os dang //
T02D2661:324b-12: lha bshos phyogs kyi gtor ma yis //
T02D2661:324b-13: rgyu drug 'gro tshim byed mthu yis //
T02D2661:324b-15: / gnyis pa bdag zhugs cho 'phrul gyis //
T02D2661:324b-16: che ba'i don thabs bstan pas 'dzin //
T02D2661:324b-17: ting nge 'dzin dang byin gyis brlab //
T02D2661:324b-18: dbang bskur mchod pa'i cho 'phrul lo //
T02D2661:324b-19: bdag nyid dang po rnal 'dug dang //
T02D2661:324b-20: ting 'dzin zhugs pa rnam gnyis so //
T02D2661:324b-22: dam bca' dbang thob snying rje yis //
T02D2661:324b-23: thabs dang shes rab don byed par //
T02D2661:324b-24: 'phags pa kun mkhyen spyan drangs la //
T02D2661:324b-25: aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a lnga yis //
T02D2661:324b-26: byin gyis brlabs la svas dbang bskur //
T02D2661:324b-27: phyag rgya'i go cha ham gi bgo //
T02D2661:324b-28: tushya ho: dang sandhi tishtha dang //
T02D2661:324b-29: ya th'a badzra satva tishtha tam aa ham bam //
T02D2661:324b-30: dgongs pas grub pa zhugs dang bskyed //
T02D2661:324b-31: de nas khro bos bgegs mtshams bcad //
T02D2661:324b-32: zhugs pas de bzhin nyid kun snang //
T02D2661:324b-33: rgyu las 'byung ba rim la bskyed //
T02D2661:324b-34: de steng gzhal yas khang rgyan ldan //
T02D2661:324b-35: nang du gdan dag bskyed pa'i steng //
T02D2661:324b-37: sgo dang sgo khang bya dang bcas //
T02D2661:324b-38: sems can padma nyi zla'i gdan //
T02D2661:324b-39: ci rigs par ni mdzes par bya //
T02D2661:324b-40: de steng sems nyid dag pa yis //
T02D2661:324b-41: rgyu las chos nyid mngon byang chub //
T02D2661:324b-42: de gzugs zla ba yig 'bru dang //
T02D2661:324b-43: phyag mtshan dang ni sku rdzogs pa //
T02D2661:324b-44: 'bras bu dang ni bskyed pa lnga //
T02D2661:324b-45: stong pa'i cho 'phrul lnga rgyu lnga //
T02D2661:324b-46: chos nyid rgyu las rnam snang mngon byang chub //
T02D2661:324b-47: gzugs brnyan zla ba mi bskyod mngon byang chub //
T02D2661:324b-48: yig 'bru rin chen 'byung ldan mngon byang chub //
T02D2661:324b-49: phyag mtshan snang ba mtha' yas mngon byang chub //
T02D2661:324b-50: gzugs sku don yod grub pa mngon byang chub //
T02D2661:324b-51: snang ston sra brtan sreg byed dang //
T02D2661:325a-2: nam mkha' sa me chu rlung gi //
T02D2661:325a-3: de yi byin rlabs thams cad mngon byang chub //
T02D2661:325a-4: rgyu las bag chags gnas gyur chos dbyings bskyed //
T02D2661:325a-5: zla ba kun gzhi gnas gyur me long bskyed //
T02D2661:325a-6: yig 'bru nyon mongs gnas gyur mnyam sems bskyed //
T02D2661:325a-7: phyag mtshan yid gyur so sor rtog sems bskyed //
T02D2661:325a-8: sku ni sgo lnga bya ba nan tan bskyed //
T02D2661:325a-9: rtag chad gzung 'dzin bdag gzhan bya ba grub //
T02D2661:325a-10: chos nyid rgyu las rnam snang mngon bstan pas //
T02D2661:325a-11: bsam gtan tshul te sangs rgyas rjes dran sku //
T02D2661:325a-12: aom tsitta pra ti be dham ka ro y'a mi /
T02D2661:325a-14: don dam rang bzhin spros med sems kyi dbyings //
T02D2661:325a-15: rgyal ba rgyal mtsho'i thugs dang ye nas mnyam //
T02D2661:325a-16: mngon par byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2661:325a-17: chos dbyings nyid mi gnas ji bzhin dang //
T02D2661:325a-18: gzugs brnyan zla ba mi bskyod mngon bstan pas //
T02D2661:325a-19: ye shes tshul te dge 'dun rjes dran sku //
T02D2661:325a-20: aom biddhi tsitta tsandra autpa'ad ya mi /
T02D2661:325a-22: bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D2661:325a-23: zla ba nya ba bzhin du snang ba ste //
T02D2661:325a-24: kun du bzang po ye nas dag pa'i don //
T02D2661:325a-25: mngon par byang chub rang bzhin 'od kyang gsal //
T02D2661:325a-26: yig 'bru rin chen 'byung ldan mngon bstan pas //
T02D2661:325a-27: sbyin pa'i tshul te gtong ba rjes dran sku//
T02D2661:325a-28: aom h'um sv'a aa: ha tishtha ae ma ho //
T02D2661:325a-29: ma rig sel cing yang dag rig bskyed pa //
T02D2661:325a-30: gsung gi rang bzhin che ba'i byin rlabs te //
T02D2661:325a-31: gsang ba bsgrub pa'i mchog tu bsngags pas na //
T02D2661:325a-32: don gyi snying po spros med byang chub dbyings //
T02D2661:325a-33: phyag mtshan so so mtha' yas mngon bstan pas //
T02D2661:325a-34: tshul khrims tshul de gnyis rtog chos dran sku //
T02D2661:325a-35: tsakra badzra ratna padma karma sv'a bh'a wa a'atmako& ham /
T02D2661:325a-37: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2661:325a-38: thugs nyid ye shes lnga yi rtags su snang //
T02D2661:325a-39: mi g-yo mi ldog mchog gi rang bzhin pas //
T02D2661:325a-40: ji bzhin mnyam pas byang chub chen po'i ngang //
T02D2661:325a-41: skur gyur gzugs las don yod skur ston pas //
T02D2661:325a-42: brtson 'grus tshul te lha rjes dran pa'i sku //
T02D2661:325a-43: aom h'um sva a'a:ha ya tha satva tishtha tam aa ham /
T02D2661:325a-45: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2661:325a-46: ma skyes ye shes mnyam pa nyid //
T02D2661:325a-47: thabs la mkhas dang thugs rje yi //
T02D2661:325a-48: de nyid phyag rgya chen por snang //
T02D2661:325b-0: sngags ni @325b sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs //
T02D2661:325b-1: tshigs bcad don grub rtog tshad gsol //
T02D2661:325b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2661:325b-3: dgyes pa'i phyag ni spyi bor gzhag / byin gyis brlab phyir aom a'a:h'um //
T02D2661:325b-4: dbang bskur sva 'bar rin po che //
T02D2661:325b-5: yongs su grub dang gzhan dbang dang //
T02D2661:325b-6: kun brtags pa ni thams cad la'o //
T02D2661:325b-7: yongs su grub pa zhes pa ni //
T02D2661:325b-8: rnam snang mdzad chen de nyid do //
T02D2661:325b-9: gzhan dbang rjes su bstan pa ni //
T02D2661:325b-10: sangs rgyas mang pos sngags gsungs rtogs //
T02D2661:325b-11: kun brtags zhes su bstan pa ni //
T02D2661:325b-12: 'og min gnas dang ri rab zom //
T02D2661:325b-13: rdo rje gdan la sogs ston pa'o //
T02D2661:325b-14: 'khor rnams thams cad sgo mdun bskyed //
T02D2661:325b-15: 'bras bu lnga ni yongs su grub //
T02D2661:325b-16: bskyed pa gzhan dbang yin par bshad //
T02D2661:325b-17: ston pa'i cho 'phrul kun brtags so //
T02D2661:325b-18: snyan gsan gsol spyan drang la gzhug //
T02D2661:325b-19: dam tshig phyag 'tshal mchod bstod chos //
T02D2661:325b-20: byang chub sdom go byin rlabs dang //
T02D2661:325b-21: mtshams bcad dam tshig dbog rig bya //
T02D2661:325b-23: rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas //
T02D2661:325b-24: mgon po dam can ji snyed po //
T02D2661:325b-25: thams cad kun nas dgongs su gsol //
T02D2661:325b-26: gnyis med rnam dag dbyings mchog na //
T02D2661:325b-27: mnyam nyid gnas pa de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2661:325b-28: bskul pa'i sa la bzhengs nas kyang //
T02D2661:325b-29: sems can don la rab brtson pa'i //
T02D2661:325b-30: rgyal ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2661:325b-31: byang chub sems dpa' lcam dral dang //
T02D2661:325b-32: khro bo khro mo la sogs kun //
T02D2661:325b-33: rgyud lnga'i sems can sbyang ba dang //
T02D2661:325b-34: khyad par bdag dang yon bdag dang //
T02D2661:325b-36: rang bzhin rdzogs chen bzhugs gnas nas //
T02D2661:325b-38: thugs rjes byon dgongs spyan 'dren sbyon [?] //
T02D2661:325b-39: ae hye hi buddha dh'a tv'i shva ri bo dhi satva sarba sa m'a dza:/
T02D2661:325b-40: chos dbyings nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa na //
T02D2661:325b-41: rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas khyad par can //
T02D2661:325b-42: rab 'byams mchod pa'i bklubs shing ni //
T02D2661:325b-43: nyi zla pad sogs gdan steng nas //
T02D2661:325b-45: bkra shis dpal mchog gzhal yas khang //
T02D2661:325b-46: bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas //
T02D2661:326a-1: thugs rje dam can smon lam gyis //
T02D2661:326a-2: sems can don phyir chos sku las //
T02D2661:326a-3: gzugs sku longs spyod rdzogs skur snang //
T02D2661:326a-4: thugs rjes sprul skur gshegs pa bzhin //
T02D2661:326a-6: byin gyis rlabs kyis gshegs su gsol //
T02D2661:326a-7: dkyil 'khor gang lhags lha tshogs kun //
T02D2661:326a-8: tshom tshom mtshams bsdebs spyan drangs la //
T02D2661:326a-9: stobs bcu'i rtsal 'chang mi yi seng ge sbyon [*spyon?] //
T02D2661:326a-10: gti mug mun sel 'jig rten sgron ma sbyon [*spyon?] //
T02D2661:326a-11: nyon mongs nad sel sman pa'i rgyal po sbyon [*spyon?] //
T02D2661:326a-12: bdud rigs pham mdzad thar ba'i lam ston sbyon [*spyon?] //
T02D2661:326a-13: dbang mdzad rgyal po 'dir sbyon [*spyon?] mchod pa bzhes //
T02D2661:326a-14: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs ma lus gnas 'dir spyon //
T02D2661:326a-15: ae ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2661:326a-16: yang dag spyan 'dren bstan pa'i bdag / gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs bas //
T02D2661:326a-18: ae ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2661:326a-19: rin chen zhags pa dam po'i bdag / rdul phran bzhugs pa thams cad kun //
T02D2661:326a-20: slar yang bdag gis drang bar bgyi //
T02D2661:326a-21: ae ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2661:326a-22: padma lcags sgrog dam pa'i bdag / bcings pa kun las grol ba rnams //
T02D2661:326a-23: sems can don du bcing bar 'dod //
T02D2661:326a-24: ae ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2661:326a-25: rgya gram dril bu dbab brtan bdag / kun gyi chos bdag gyur pa yang //
T02D2661:326a-26: bran du yang ni gyur cing zhugs //
T02D2661:326a-27: dza:h'um bam ho:ae hye hi bha ga b'a na /
T02D2661:326a-28: ma h'a k'a ru ni ka dri shya ho:sa ma ya dza:h'um /

T02D2661:326a-45: nub tu klu gdug bzlog pa'o//
T02D2661:326b-0: @326b byang nas las la gzhug pa'o //

T02D2661:326b-37: mi yi mchog ni rgyal po ste //
T02D2661:326b-38: rgya mtsho chu bo rnams kyi mchog / zla ba rgyu skar rnams kyi gtso //
T02D2661:326b-39: nyi ma snang byed rnams kyi gtso //
T02D2661:326b-40: bsgrub pa'i mchog ni gsang sngags te //

T02D2661:326b-42: gnas kyi mchog ni dkyil 'khor bzhi //
T02D2661:326b-43: steng dang 'og dang thad kar yang //
T02D2661:326b-45: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na //

T02D2661:326b-47: bstan pa'i mchog ni rdzogs chen po //
T02D2661:326b-48: rdo rje rgyud du bsngags pa yin //

T02D2661:326b-50: de bzhin bzlas pa'i 'og tu yang //
T02D2661:326b-51: sngags pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni //
T02D2661:326b-52: thams cad du yang bsngags pa yin //
T02D2661:327a-2: dang por shin tu 'dod pa yin //
T02D2661:327a-3: bzlas dang sbyin sreg 'brel pa ni //
T02D2661:327a-4: de ni bar du 'dod pa yin //
T02D2661:327a-5: bzlas pa'i mjug gi sbyin sreg gang //
T02D2661:327a-6: de nas shin tu gtso bar bshad //
T02D2661:327a-7: dang pos bu lon rtog pa bsal //
T02D2661:327a-8: bar du lha rnams tshim bya'i phyir //

T02D2661:327a-11: dad byams yid kyis mchod sbyin bya //
T02D2661:327a-12: las rnams brtsam par byas nas ni //
T02D2661:327a-13: gtum chen rngam po'ang lhan ner 'gyur //
T02D2661:327a-14: lha rnams dkar po byams dang ldan //
T02D2661:327a-15: zlum po dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par //
T02D2661:327a-16: lha rnams 'khor bcas brgyan par bzhugs //
T02D2661:327a-17: ho ma mchog zlum gdengs pa la //
T02D2661:327a-18: rdo rje padmas rab brgyan te //
T02D2661:327a-19: phur pa dkar po drug btab par //
T02D2661:327a-20: yid la shin tu gsal byas te //
T02D2661:327a-21: byin za dge ba rab sbar bstan //
T02D2661:327a-22: yam shing dkar po rnams kyi me //
T02D2661:327a-23: rab sbar rdo rje khro bo yi //
T02D2661:327a-24: ngang byams gzhag ste snyoms zhugs la //
T02D2661:327a-25: til bsregs bzhin du sdig bsregs shing //
T02D2661:327a-26: che ge sarba p'a pam da ha na h'um phat dzva la ram //
T02D2661:327a-27: shar lho kha khyer de nyid la //
T02D2661:327a-28: dam tshig nyid kyi ram spros te //
T02D2661:327a-29: zhal gcig phyag bzhi zla dkar bzhin //
T02D2661:327a-30: zhi ba'i lus dang lta ba'i thabs //
T02D2661:327a-31: skyin chen dkar po'i gdan bzhugs bsam //
T02D2661:327a-32: ye shes aagne'i thugs dam bskul //
T02D2661:327a-33: aom na mo badzra p'a na ye /
T02D2661:327a-34: na mo dzny'a na aagna ye de ba dzva la ram /
T02D2661:327a-35: lan gsum brjod pas zhal phyogs shing //
T02D2661:327a-36: spyan gzigs thugs dgongs de nyid la //
T02D2661:327a-37: dam tshig pa yi lcags kyu bcas //
T02D2661:327a-38: gnyis min dbyings las bskul pa yi //
T02D2661:327a-39: ye shes drang srong chen po nyid //
T02D2661:327a-40: sngon gyi smon lam thugs rje yis //
T02D2661:327a-41: byin gyis brlab phyir gshegs su gsol //
T02D2661:327a-42: dza: h'um bam ho: ae hyi he /
T02D2661:327a-43: aom badzra ha ri bi ga / pa ta tsi ba lo ke ti /
T02D2661:327a-44: ya sha de hi de ba bata ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2661:327a-45: na mo badzra p'a na sye /
T02D2661:327a-49: ai ha ai ha a'a gatstsha h'um ta sha n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2661:327a-50: ye shes me lha byon nas ni //
T02D2661:327a-51: dam tshig bskyed dang gcig gyur nas //
T02D2661:327a-52: mdun du bzhugs pa de nyid la //
T02D2661:327a-53: gnyis med drang srong aagne la //
T02D2661:327a-54: bdug spos chur byas bsang ba ni //

T02D2661:327b-0: spos @327b lnga sman sbyar chu gtsang rgyal ba'i khrus //

T02D2661:337b-48: de nas dbang mchog bskur ba ni //
T02D2661:337b-49: pashtsi ma yi phyogs dag tu //
T02D2661:337b-50: khru gang ba yi dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2661:337b-52: tshon ni dmar pos legs bris la //
T02D2661:337b-53: bkra shis brgyad kyi phyag rgya dgod //
T02D2661:337b-54: dbu rgyan cod pa na me tog phreng //
T02D2661:337b-55: phyag rgya bzhi dang rin chen bdun //
T02D2661:338a-2: dung dang bkra shis ras thogs gzhag / bdug spos ras sar gdugs sham can //
T02D2661:338a-3: rnga yab bsil yab zho phor gang //
T02D2661:338a-4: bum pa bzhi sogs mi res gzung //
T02D2661:338a-5: mchod pa la sogs bkra shis brjod //
T02D2661:338a-6: aom bhri ta bhri ta sarba a'a ba ra na ni h'um phat /
T02D2661:338a-7: aom tra ta tra ta sarba a'a ba ra na ni h'um phat /
T02D2661:338a-8: bi dra ba bi dra ba sarba aa pa ya tang dva na h'um phat /
T02D2661:338a-9: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab //
T02D2661:338a-10: de nas thur ma me long dung //
T02D2661:338a-12: phreng bas bum pa nyan pa dang //
T02D2661:338a-13: gsang sngags phyag rgya cod pan dang //
T02D2661:338a-14: 'khor bsgyur ming dbang dbu rgyan dang //
T02D2661:338a-16: bcu gsum pa ni nor dbang bskur //
T02D2661:338a-17: 'khor lo rin chen bstabs pas ni //
T02D2661:338a-18: sa bcu kun la dbang ba dang ;
T02D2661:338a-19: / theg pa mtha' dag ston pa yi //
T02D2661:338a-20: chos kyi rgyal po chen por shog / glang po rin chen bstabs pas ni //
T02D2661:338a-21: theg pa kun gyi don rtogs nas //
T02D2661:338a-22: stobs bcu kun la dbang thob cing //
T02D2661:338a-23: byang chub 'bras bu thob par shog / rta mchog rin chen bstabs pas ni //
T02D2661:338a-24: rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi'i dbang thob nas //
T02D2661:338a-25: nyon mongs rgya mtsho rgal ba yi //
T02D2661:338a-26: thar pa'i 'bras bu thob par shog / nor bu rin chen bstabs pas ni //
T02D2661:338a-27: 'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2661:338a-28: dpe byad mtshan gyis brgyan pa yi //
T02D2661:338a-29: gser gyi sku mdog thob par shog / dmag mi rin chen bstabs pas ni //
T02D2661:338a-30: mi 'jigs bzhi yi dbang thob nas //
T02D2661:338a-31: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa'i //
T02D2661:338a-32: go cha chen po bgos par shog / blon po rin chen bstabs pas ni //
T02D2661:338a-33: sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug rje //
T02D2661:338a-34: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i brgya byin gyi //
T02D2661:338a-35: lha yi rgyal po thob par shog / btsun mo rin chen bstabs pas ni //
T02D2661:338a-36: shes rab yum gyi dbang thob cing //
T02D2661:338a-37: skye 'gag med pa'i don rtogs nas //
T02D2661:338b-0: bla med 'bras bu thob par shog / de @338b bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa yi //
T02D2661:338b-1: nyon mongs sel ba'i grub rdzas dpa' bo 'dis //
T02D2661:338b-2: bar chod bgegs kyi tshogs rnams rnam 'jig cing //
T02D2661:338b-3: skye 'grub mchog thob deng 'dir bkra shis shog / ji ltar lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis //
T02D2661:338b-4: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtsa mchog pu ta na //
T02D2661:338b-5: d'ur ba'i gdan la bzhugs nas bdud btul ltar //
T02D2661:338b-6: dpe 'dir bkra shis phun sum tshogs par shog / ji ltar sngon gyi drang srong aa ga stas //
T02D2661:338b-7: byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyugs kyi dngos grub 'di //
T02D2661:338b-8: khyim bdag dbang phyug che la byin pa yis //
T02D2661:338b-9: skye dgu'i gsos gyur bcud ldan bkra shis shog / rdo rje dang ni rin chen chu skyes dang //
T02D2661:338b-10: de bzhin las kyi sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i //
T02D2661:338b-11: li khris 'jig rten gsum po dbang bsdus shing //
T02D2661:338b-12: dngos grub mchog thob ding 'dir bkra shis shog//
T02D2661:338b-13: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dung //
T02D2661:338b-14: na ra ya nar dung sgra bsgrags pa ltar //
T02D2661:338b-15: bu khyod dam pa'i chos sgra rab sgrogs shing //
T02D2661:338b-16: 'gro ba 'dren mdzad deng 'dir bkra shis shog / chos rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu sta //
T02D2661:338b-17: smig rgyu lta bur yang dag rtogs pa'i mthus //
T02D2661:338b-18: ma rig mun sel ye shes thob gyur nas //
T02D2661:338b-19: dngos grub mchog thob deng 'dir bkra shis shog / ji ltar glang po chen po aa ga ta'i //
T02D2661:338b-20: gi'u wang srog gi dbang por gyur pa ltar //
T02D2661:338b-21: de bzhin bu khyod tshe srog 'dzin gyur nas //
T02D2661:338b-22: dngos grub mchog thob dang 'dir bkra shis shog / ji ltar rgyu dang sa bon chung ba las //
T02D2661:338b-23: 'bras bu cher smin shing thog bi la ba ltar //
T02D2661:338b-24: de bzhin bsod rnams rgyu tshogs chung du las //
T02D2661:338b-25: 'bras bu bla med byang chub thob par shog / gtsug tor spyan ljags go chas bskur //
T02D2661:338b-26: lag gnyis bcings te gung gshibs bsgreng //
T02D2661:338b-27: mdzub gnyis bkug sbyar gtsug tor ro //
T02D2661:338b-28: na ma:sa manta buddh'a n'am h'um h'um h'um /
T02D2661:338b-29: lag gnyis bcings te gung srin lag / brkyang ste mthe bo nang bcug ming //
T02D2661:338b-31: ga ga na ba ra la ksha na /
T02D2661:339a-1: ya ta th'a ga ta tsakshu sv'a h'a /
T02D2661:339a-2: lag gnyis thal mo khong stong sbyar //
T02D2661:339a-3: mdzub gnyis dkris la srin lag gtugs //
T02D2661:339a-4: mthe bo gnyis gshibs ljags su bshad //
T02D2661:339a-5: na ma: sa manta bu ddh'a n'am /
T02D2661:339a-6: ta th'a ga ta dzi hva sarba dharm'a pra ti tishtha /
T02D2661:339a-7: lag pa gnyis ni khong stong sbyar //
T02D2661:339a-8: mdzub gnyis ngos nas dkris pa ni //
T02D2661:339a-9: go cha'i phyag rgya zhes su bshad //
T02D2661:339a-10: na ma: sa manta buddh'a n'am /
T02D2661:339a-11: pra tsanda badzra la bi yu ra h'um /
T02D2661:339a-12: de nas slob ma'i thog dag tu //
T02D2661:339a-13: gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu ba can //
T02D2661:339a-14: theg chen chos kyi ngo bo ste //
T02D2661:339a-15: nyon mongs gdung ba sel byed pa'i //
T02D2661:339a-16: dbang mchog dam pa bskur bar bya //
T02D2661:339a-17: sum cu rtsa lngas legs dbang bskur //
T02D2661:339a-18: de nas dge pa sgo bzhin sa //
T02D2661:339a-19: sgra yi rjes su legs sbyar zhing //
T02D2661:339a-20: blo dang ldan pas smon lam gdab //
T02D2661:339a-21: shar phyogs sgo la p'u bas bsdu //
T02D2661:339a-22: sngon dang thog ma phur pas bsdu//
T02D2661:339a-23: de mthun rdo rje sems la sogs //
T02D2661:339a-24: sgrib gnyis byang bas chogs gnyis rdzogs //
T02D2661:339a-25: de bzhin slob ma tshogs rdzogs nas //
T02D2661:339a-26: me long ye shes thab par shog / lha sgo dakshi na sa bsdu'o //
T02D2661:339a-27: sbyin gnas la yang dakshi na bsdu'o //
T02D2661:339a-30: byang sgo autta ra yis bsdu //
T02D2661:339a-31: thugs rje gzungs la autta ras bsdu //
T02D2661:339a-32: gong gi rigs dang ye shes drang //
T02D2661:339a-33: sngon gyi smon lam ston bstan pa //
T02D2661:339a-34: dri ma med pa'i dpe bzhin no //
T02D2661:339a-35: dkyil 'khor rang bzhin lnga dag kyang //
T02D2661:339a-36: ci rigs par ni bstan par bya //
T02D2661:339a-37: tantra rgya mtsho dbyings kyi gting rum nas //
T02D2661:339a-38: don mchog cha shas btus pa'i nying khu ste //
T02D2661:339a-39: sbyor ba'i lam rgyud phyogs 'grol 'brel pa yi //
T02D2661:339a-40: mchog thob rnam snang mdzad kyi zhal mthong shog /
T02D2661:339a-42: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sthi ra ma ti
T02D2661:339a-43: sa yo ga'i gzhung rgyud phyi nang las nges don
T02D2661:339a-45: rgyan dam pa'i le'u bam po gcig tu byas pa rdzogs so /
